"I know why you're here. And trust me. This isn't how I wanted it to happen either, but that's neither here nor there." she said, sounding almost aloof as she grabbed one of the wedges of sandwich from the plate.

"How do you..."

"It's obvious why you're here. Any fool could've figured it out. I offered to grant your wish, and next thing you know you're a girl. It wouldn't be that hard to put two and two together."

"Oh." was all you could get out.

"Yes, oh. Though, that isn't why you're here now." she said, leaning her head back in the chair, casting her eyes towards the ceiling.

"So why doesn't anyone else remember me as a boy?" you asked, finally finding your voice.

"Ah, that is the heart of the question now isn't it. Why does no one remember David? Is a butterfly still a caterpillar, or are they one creature living two lives?"

You head was spinning as she continued, and it was all you could do to focus on what she was saying.

"After all, we do not call butterflies caterpillars, nor caterpillars butterflies. But, they each serve a purpose." She said, a slight smile on her face, "but again, that is neither here nor there, and we have far too much to discuss."

"So then, what happened to me."

"I thought that was obvious. You're now a girl. You've begun your metamorphosis into something new. And like the caterpillar, I fear there is no undoing what has begun." she mused, looking at you with that same half smile.

"So you can't turn me back?" you said, slightly louder than you'd anticipated.

"Of course not. The butterfly never longs to be a caterpillar, and so should you leave that old life behind. However, that does not mean that our business is concluded. Far from it. For you see without my help, you will surely loose control of what you have inherited."

"And what is that." you shot through a mouthful of sandwich.

"Well your wish obviously." she said, rolling her eyes.

"I never wished to be a girl!" you shouted.

"Ah, but you did wish for a different life, and here it is. Many people would kill for the opportunity to start over new." she said, staying surprisingly calm, "You you are here for answers, and that I can give."

"So-" you started before she held up a finger, cutting you off.

"I can give answers, but every transaction must be balanced. When you go to the store and buy a loaf of bread, you pay what the loaf is worth. If you pay too much, then change must be given. And if you pay too little, then the loaf is not given. This is the way of balance. I grant wishes, though do not take me to be an unforgiving hag."

You looked at the ground, embarrassed that she had yet again seemed to guess what you were thinking. However, you stayed quiet as she continued talking.

"Only those who have need of my services are able to find me. And obviously your wish needed to be granted, or we would not be having this conversation. Still, you have received a wish that was not paid for. Now I am offering my help, however, it must be paid in full before I will oblige you."

"But I don't have any money. Everyone thinks that I'm ten." you said, wishing that she had brought more food for you to devour.

"Ah, I am not asking for money. You will work for me, here in my home and shop. And when I feel that you have paid what you owe, I will grant you the help that you desire. However, the other option is that you turn around and leave. Forced to make this change on your own. It is your choice."

"It is done then. And before you ask. I will see to it that no one questions my employment of a 10 year old."

122112333221311233132322112313311.content:
You stepped away from the kitchen table, glancing around the deserted kitchen. You could still hear Rose's music blaring upstairs, though it seemed like your mother hadn't gotten home yet from the silence in the rest of the house. The smell of cookies still lingered, though it seemed like Rose had finished off the remainder of them at some point.

Your stomach let out a growl, causing you to rub your soft gut, trying to soothe the beast. Despite eating at Sarah's, you were still starving. You'd never had to deal with the feeling of being constantly hungry before. Still, you'd never been a girl before.

Carefully, you waddled towards the cupboards, throwing them open. Your heart sunk deeper and deeper as you revealed each cupboard to be picked clean of snacks and food. You finally threw open the fridge and gave a sigh of relief. It looked like there was leftover lasagna from an earlier meal, enough for 3 or 4 adults. Or, just one of you.

You removed the pan with the lasagna, loading the contents onto a plate and sticking it into the microwave. Slowly, the delicious smell of lasagna began to fill the kitchen as the microwave hummed. Your mouth was salivating at the meal you were about to consume, as you watched the timer on the microwave ticking down. You were practically jumping with anticipation of the meal that was to come. Finally, a beep echoed through the kitchen, signaling that your food was ready.

You were like an entirely different person, shoveling food into your mouth almost faster than you could swallow it as you downed the carb-heavy dish.

You jumped as you heard a voice come from the doorway to the living room, "Maddie! Did you eat all the leftover lasagna? That was going to be dinner tonight!"

You turned and saw your mother with her hands on her hips, staring you down as you glanced at the now empty plate. You mumbled that you'd been hungry and didn't know how long she was going to be.

"Well. What's done is done. But I wish you would have been more patient. It's no wonder you and your sister are starting to get so fat." you mother said, moving to open the fridge, "I guess, we'll be eating out tonight though since we don't have any more food, thanks to you two."

Slowly, you slid out of the kitchen, leaving your mother muttering to herself as she took account of everything that she needed to get from the store. You rubbed your stuffed belly, slowly making your way upstairs towards your room. Plopping your fat body down on your bed, you lay staring at the ceiling.

You had gone to Sarah's for answers, and while she had promised to give them to you, she hadn't said when. On top of that, Rose and your mother had been acting weird. While you were pretty sure Rose was just embarrassed about actively trying to get fatter, there was still the matter of your mother. She had been talking to someone, then had left with a bunch of papers. However, Sarah had told you that you couldn't go back to being a boy, and that you might as well get used to being a girl. Other than that though, she hadn't given you any clues as to what was happening to you.

You pulled out the smartphone and looked it over. It seemed like just an average smartphone, with nothing really special about it. Though, there had also been the way that you'd returned to your home. What would be the cost for getting you back home that quickly. After all, it seemed like that had been a favor to you, and Sarah was all about balance. Your stomach turned as you dreaded what she was going to charge you for that quick delivery.

"Rose! Maddie! I'm going to the store. We're going to Big Ben's Burgers tonight for dinner as soon as I get home, so make sure you're ready. I'll be back soon. I love you!"

You heard the front door close from your position on your soft bed, made softer by the padding you were developing on your body. A few moments later you heard your mother's car start up, and drive away. Leaving you and Rose alone in the house. This might be a good opportunity to see if your mother had left any clues about what she's been up to, though now the question was where to search. Fortunately Rose shouldn't be much of a problem since she was shut in her room. Though, you probably wouldn't have time to search everywhere before your mother got back.

1221123332213112331323221123133112.content:
You already had your mother displeased with you. So sneaking into her room using the spare key she told you about when you used to be a older boy wouldn't really bite you in the butt now. And you were all too curious to get to the bottom of what your mom was doing earlier today. What stood out to you was the fact that she almost chastised you and Rose for eating so much, but afterwards let you know you'd be going to the local buger place after.

If you didn't know any better it was like your mother wanted you two to get fatter? As you unlocked her door and slid the key back into it's hiding spot in the nearby plant, you could only hope something in the room would enlighten you. Closing, and locking the door behind you, no need to have your sister come in by accident. You look around for anything of note. The room not seeing any different then what you remember before your changes.

However on the desk next to your mother's bed was a very familiar folder. The one she had been carrying when she went out earlier. Excited, and a little bit anxious you waddle to the bed and sit on the far side of it, pulling the folder up and using your food filled belly as a table of sorts as you panned through it.

There was a decent amount of papers, with lots of words that you didn't feel you had the time to read thoroughly, so instead you skimmed it. What first stood out is that the information on the page was strikingly similar to what Rose had on her computer. Citing the same study that linked increase hunger and weight gain to fertility in young women. However the folder goes into more details, or speculation you weren't quite sure.

Whoever wrote all this believes the weight gain and side effects to be the symptom of something else entirely, and recommends any effected parties to treat it as if they were pregnant themselves, and to listen to whatever their bodies demands were. It didn't go into details, but the paper hinted at the fate of those that didn't not being pleasant. Well, that explained at least why your mother was so eager to feed you and Rose.

You flip a few papers forward to find a more personalized note from one Dr.S- something? You squint at the name, unable to really read it for some odd reason. Reading down for context it was addressed to your mother "Miss, based on the samples you delivered to my facility we can confirm your eldest daughter has contracted what we are now referring to as Ferya's Fever. I highly suspect your youngest to have it as well based on the behaviors you mentioned. I have included basic instructions for dealing with the fever. But for the most part it's best to wait it out. It is not contagious so you need not keep them out of social functions. Just be mindful of their needs and that said needs might change unexpectedly."

At the bottom of the page was a list of symptoms with a disclaimer that not all were confirmed to be related. Hunger, lactation, high or low metabolism, increased libido, increased stomach capacity. And then in big bold letters, Ability to dislocate jaw and swallow some foods whole . You weren't sure if you had this fever yourself, but you definitely fit the hunger bill. Maybe you could try to see if you were lactating like your sister? The dislocating jaw thing would also be another definite. While you muss over your next move, you put the folder back and hop off the bed.

You bit your lip, looking down at your chubby body. It was true that you'd been unusually hungry lately, though you'd kind of just assumed that was normal for a girl. It wasn't like you had any prior experience in the matter. Still, whatever this Ferya's Fever was, it sounded interesting. Though, perhaps you could find some more information hidden somewhere in the room.

You jumped as you heard a car outside, rushing to the window and looking out into the evening light.

It was just a car driving past your house, but the fact remained that the longer you stayed, the more likely you were to be caught. Still, this was your best chance for answers. You began riffling through different hiding places, losing track of time as you searched.

"Maddie! What are you doing in here?!" your eyes darted open as your mother strode into her room, glaring at you.

"I, uh..." You jumped from your prone position on the bed, hating that you'd somehow let yourself fall asleep in your parents room.

"You what?" Your mother said, placing her hands on her hips as she stared you down.

"I was looking for, uh," you glanced around the room, hoping anything would come to mind, "my, uh, new shirt...."

You glanced at the floor, disappointed in yourself for coming up with such a lame excuse. It had to be your new child's brain. Wasn't nearly as creative. That was it.

"Maddie, you're wearing your shirt." She said, raising her eyebrow, "Look, I know you haven't been feeling good, but you really should be resting in your room, not running around burning all your energy."

She seemed to soften as you nodded sullenly. You didn't know why, but you felt genuinely bad for disappointing her. Perhaps that was another change of your younger body. Still, you probably shouldn't push your luck with your mom. You didn't want her getting suspicious of you.

Your mother placed her hand on your shoulder as you started to walk past her, "Hey. Go get ready for dinner. I'll get your sister."

A few minutes later, you were in the back of your mom's car on your way to the burger place. You kept playing with your soft belly as the three of you rode along in silence. Going out for food was one of the few ways to get Rose to actually join you and your mother on a trip to anywhere.

You looked curiously at how the seat belt seemed to sink into your soft belly, creating several folds of fat. Your sister seemed to be having a similar situation with her seat belt, though she didn't seem to mind. If you did have that fever, that would definitely explain your hunger. Though at the same time, it might lead to you getting a lot fatter than you'd ever intended. However, you did like the idea of being able to look at your fat, feminine form whenever you wanted. However, maybe you should try to slow down a little. You could also take this time to admire your fattening sister.

You're not sure if it's possible. But you kind of wanted to temper you gains a bit. You were already showing quite a bit of fat on you despite being rather skinny only two days before. And though you loved how the majority of it seemed to settle on your belly, you had honest concerns about what might happened if you continued, or even increased your current pace. Mostly about your mobility, as you were already struggling to waddle around when full.

But you knew you couldn't just ignore the hunger, you'd fail to keep yourself in check sometimes. That's when you remembered Rose, not only was she trying to gain weight by your best guess. But she was envious of your gains. You actually felt a little bad that she was outdone considering this isn't something you aimed for, but it gave you a good plan of action. Maybe your body might be satisfied with helping Rose eat more, or maybe you can just train Rose to steal the food from your plate so you don't end up a immobile blob by the end of the week.

Grinning at your master plan, the three of you got out once your mother pulled into the parking lot, as you smirked at your sister. The first step of your plan would be to rile her up. "Hey Rose. Bet I can eat more then you can~" Your sister turns to you, giving you the stink eye before saying "Yeah right you punk." But you could see her tense up a bit as your mother reminded you both to be on your best behavior.

You hummed to yourself as you walked inside, your mom getting a booth for the three of you as the slightly chubby waitress leaves you with menus. You grumbled as you had to insist for the regular menu and not the kids menu. That was critical as you were planning on ordering food not just for you, but to trick Rose into eating as well. Once the waitress came back around the three of you ordered, your mother "I'll have the Californian cheeseburger please. " before the lady turned to you.

"I'll have a Bufflo Bacon burger, a Lambo ranch buger, Two mini sliders, and uhh... a plate of fries?" You ask, not sure if you could just strait up order a plate of fries. Your mother looks a little shocked, as dose the waitress. But your mom dosen't object so she just puts the big order down. Your sister though is glaring daggers at you and orders everything you just did "...Plus a Gumundo delux burger"

Firstly you make sure the plate of fries are evenly between you and Rose in the middle of the table. And as the two of you start on your burger you make sure she sees that you pick a few up from both plates. You could see her eyes narrow at you but pay them no mind. After all you wanted her to think you were taking from her plate, so that she'll eat the fries off yours.

Now came the hard part, slowing down so you didn't out eat Rose. Your stomach growled at you, but you reached one hand down and patted it softly. Knowing what would eventually happen would be worth it. You sandbag yourself, only halfway done with your first burger as Rose is confidently finishing her second. That was perfect. As she started on her third, lost in a daze of food eating bliss. You swap both of your plates, replacing the empty one with the burger you didn't eat. Quickly you finish off the rest of your first burger, taking huge mouthfuls, and swallowing large portions of it intact to be digested slowly. And start on your 'third' burger.

Rose for her part was slowing down, and most of the fries in the middle were gone, and thanks to you now stuffed in Rose's gut from your trick. Along with two and half burgers. You smirk at your older sister and pull your burger back "Mmm, I'm still hungry sis, If you don't catch up to me I'm gonna eat the Gumundo burger before you~" Rose looks at your side of the table and panics, starting to eat with a new fervor as you lustfully imagine what it must be like under the table now.

You can tell you're getting Rose to push her limits as her swallows are more forced. But after the encouragement she easily finishes her third burger, and the extra one you gave to her. She was breathing heavily now but refused to back down as she started on the comically oversized burger. Having to use a fork and knife to eat it in pieces as you and your mother watched. Done with your own meals.

Rose was only about a quarter of the way through the massive burger when she leaned back in the booth. Patting her rather full stomach. So far you'd been able to resist the urge to start working on the other half of the Gumundo burger, however, as Rose pushed the plate ever so slightly away from herself, you couldn't resist. You began attacking the burger with a vengeance. Within several minutes you had devoured the rest of the giant burger, and were patting your stuffed belly.

You cringed slightly at the small look of triumph on Rose's face as you wiped the rest of the burger from your face with a napkin. Had she wanted you to finish the burger? Did she just beat you at your own game? Buy why? Despite being envious, did she also like watching you getting fatter? Either way, you had still won the battle tonight by making her eat more, but you were pretty sure that you'd just started a war. A deliciously fattening war.

You had still eaten more than a normal person would at dinner, but at least you hadn't devoured the entire restaurant. However, you couldn't help but admire your massively swollen abdomen in the car ride home. Though, your's wasn't the only distended belly in the car. Rose's belly was definitely stuffed as well, and she was quieter as usual. Still, it wasn't like you were really in a talkative mode either.

Everyone went their separate ways when you finally arrived home. Rose immediate went to her room and shut the door, while your mother did the same with her room. You made your way up to your bedroom, and plopped down on your bed with a heavy thud. It was still weird being a fat girl. Fortunately, you weren't exactly what you'd call obese yet. However, you also had a different scale of fatness than most people.

You lay staring at the ceiling as you felt your gut slowly digesting the fattening food you'd just consumed. You were sure that you'd notice it in your waistline tomorrow, but at least it wasn't as bad as it could've been. You started rubbing your belly. Your warm hands felt good on your stuffed gut, making you feel relaxed as you snuggled deeper into your soft bed. You could still hear Rose's music, though she'd turned it down significantly, like she did every night when she went to bed.

You closed your eyes thinking about all the food that you'd had today. You could practically smell the delicious flavors, as you lay in your bed. Your eyes bolted open. You could smell the delicious flavors. You glanced around the dimly lit room, spotting someone moving towards you in the dark, carrying a platter piled high with what you assumed was food. It was the same girl from the previous nights, though she was definitely a bit fatter than she'd been before.

Her belly was bigger and rounder on her wider frame, looking almost like she'd swallowed a basketball. Her breasts were starting to look quite puffy and fat, on her larger frame. Her face was starting to get rounder as well, looking more and more beautiful to you. Her thick legs rubbed together with each step she took, and you could see them ripple and jiggle as she waddled towards you. You couldn't help but feel aroused by her as your hand instinctively went to your groin. Her footsteps were heavy, sounding loud in the quiet of the night. Each step bringing her, and the massive pile of food closer to your bed.

Finally, she stopped beside you, smiling at you as she moved a cookie to her mouth from the tray. Your mouth was salivating as you watched her slowly eat the cookie, before picking up another and placing it in your mouth. It was so good. Quickly you devoured the tasty morsel, as a slice of cake was pushed to your mouth. Instinctively, you let the girl push it into your mouth as you savored the burst of flavor.

You opened your eyes, unsure of when you'd fallen asleep during your feast last night. Morning light streamed in through the window and you could hear sounds of cooking coming from the kitchen. The smell of bacon was almost overwhelming as your belly let out a loud growl. You stretched, feeling your shirt ride up on your belly, causing you to shiver at the cool air on your exposed gut. You tugged on your shirt, but found yourself unable to get it all the way around your belly. You really did need to get bigger clothes if you were going to keep getting fatter.

Slowly, you got to your feet, feeling your heavy body fighting you with every move that you made. You glanced down at your fatter belly, frowning slightly. You were really starting to get pretty fat, you thought as you grabbed your soft belly in your hands. You were definitely getting wider in other directions too though, you though, feeling your body starting to keep your arms at an angle as you let them hang at your side. They were starting to get pretty thick, and though you couldn't see your legs past your belly, you could tell they were rubbing together more than they had the day before. You were really starting to get fat.

Still, it wasn't like you could go on a diet. You didn't think you had the self control to even attempt that. However, you should definitely do better at watching how much you eat.

Your eyes shot towards the door as you heard a slight knock, before the door slowly opened. You just stared as Rose slid into your room, carrying a tray loaded with food, "Good. You're up. I know that you haven't been feeling well, and so I thought I'd make you breakfast in bed."

She slowly pushed you back onto the bed, sticking a cookie into her mouth from the tray, as you laid back down. Your stomach let out an eager growl as she pushed a cookie into your slightly open mouth. Instinctively you ate it, savoring the delicious baked morsel. As soon as you'd swallowed the cookie, she pushed a piece of cake into your mouth, smiling down at you as she rubbed her fat belly.

She was slightly fatter than she'd been the day before, but not by too much. Still, she was fatter, and that was saying something. You would definitely have gotten off to girls smaller than her when you were a boy, and she carried her weight so well. Still, she seemed determined to pay you back for the night before as she kept stuffing more and more food into your face.

info.description:
David was an ordinary high schooler with a relatively bland life. He had an average job, got average grades, and had average friends. However, just when he felt he was destined to lead nothing more than a normal life, everything gets flipped upside down. Now, he has the chance to experience every fantasy that he could ever imagine with the catch that he can never go back to the life he knew.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is a story about a boy who slowly turns into a girl, where his choices define what kind of girl he will become. His choices will change him mentally and physically, defining who he will become. Every chapter should advance the story, giving him a chance to define himself as he becomes something he loves or hates. The world does not notice the changes as history rewrites itself to account for his new forms he will take. Weight gain, pregnancy, expansion, and anthro transformations are allowed. I hope this to become a moving story while also catering to the erotic nature of being allowed to live out our fantasies and knowing that they will become reality.
